page.title: 18PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content:
Many of the games that we play in the school playground are played in small groups. Often we invent our own games but frequently base them on television programmes and films, such as Wonderwoman. Another favourite of ours is to invent space games. We are still fond of running games and either play 'tig' or kiss-chase. We also organise our own races across the yard and are quite determined to win. It is an honour to be known as the fastest runner. Sometimes we just stand and watch the others.
Egginton School Infants' class
